reviewText:
I would say that this is a good movie in almost everyway. It has good actors, the drama in every single story is very interesting, and the quality is not bad at all.
I think that this a movie that even though is not the my favorite gender, I would recomend it. It was a nice erotic movie.
*Sponsored Post

These stories are clever and entertaining. The acting was very good and the production values as high as anything I have ever seen come out of Great Britain.  The women are beautiful but, even better, they are believable- which is a real tribute to their acting because the stories are a little far fetched, although all the more fun for it.

This film is soft porn, so don't expect anything earth-shattering. But I love it for what it is; the girls are gorgeous and the stories are fun. One thing that I found interesting is that all the "private moments" happen in full view of the public!...sure that was intentional. I thought the acting was decent, and I would watch movies by this director again.
